title: Mordekaiser gutted
body:
Riot: "We want Mordekaiser's weakness to be kiting him."
Lol.. With all the mobility/CC pretty much every champion has these days, I guess his weakness is any other champion.
I never thought I would see the day where an already trash tier champion is gutted to complete worthlessness.
There is a reason why people who actually play Mordekaiser never built him as a tank... He can be completely ignored because he has no way to disrupt the enemy team. These changes just force Mordekaiser to build as a tank, which his kit is horrible at. He is going to be even more of a one trick pony now that he basically has to get a ghost to be of any use to his team now. Good job riot, good job.

RIP Mordekaiser 2015

replies.body: Whoever is putting these changes through has no idea how bad Mordekaiser is right now. From the looks of it, he's being nerfed far more than he's being buffed. I just don't understand the thought process behind these changes at all.
I honestly can't see what they're trying to do with Morde, Veigar and nerfing another jungle item because 3 junglers are running rampant...So they decide to hurt everyone else instead

Veigar's q is actually more of a benefit now. You can kill two minions at once with the q rather than just one, so you basically can double stack. His e was rather annoying for a bit, but they toned that back. As for Morde, he needs a nurf asap.

Even the Ghost sucks, because it no longer generates shield, so your super squishy while everything is on cooldown, even with ghost out.  Not to mention that even when you build bruiser with tne new changes its still across the board nerfs to his shield generation.

I don't know wtf you're talking about. That champion is toxic as all hell to play against. Infinite shield spam op. Talk about the perfect sword and shield. He'll just shit on you every time.  Dude doesn't lose lane ever. There's his strength he needs nothing else.

Um... what champ are you talking about? I seem to see a monster that only needs one item to become unkillable and deal massive amounts of damage at the same time. He was actually BUFFED recently, making him even more agonizing to play against. Since the buff, I have yet to see him lose a single game. The dude can carry without even pressing e or r.
